short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to streamline crafting tasks in Pixels, automating repetitive actions and improving efficiency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rancor is a powerful semi-automation tool designed to enhance your gaming experience and drastically boost your progress with minimal effort. Rancor offers a range of features specifically for crafting-related tasks to level up efficiently.
